mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car(car_code, car_name, type, fuel_type, authority, buy_at, memo, created_at) VALUES (#{car_code}, #{car_name}, #{type}, #{fuel_type}, #{authority}, #{buy_at}, #{memo}, LOCALTIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO car_detail(car_code, fuel_effciency, accum_mileage, car_status) VALUES (#{car_code}, #{fuel_effciency}, #{accum_mileage}, #{car_status})
INSERT INTO car_user(car_code, mem_code, created_at) VALUES(#{car_code}, #{mem_code}, LOCALTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT c1.car_code, c1.car_name, o.created_at, c2.accum_mileage, c1.memo FROM car c1 LEFT JOIN car_detail c2 ON c1.car_code = c2.car_code LEFT JOIN operation o ON o.car_code = c1.car_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT car_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM operation GROUP BY car_code ) latest_operation ON o.car_code = latest_operation.car_code AND o.created_at = latest_operation.max_created_at WHERE c1.car_code = #{car_code}

SELECT c1.type, c1.car_code, c1.car_name, o.created_at, c2.accum_mileage, c1.memo FROM car c1 LEFT JOIN car_detail c2 ON c1.car_code = c2.car_code LEFT JOIN operation o ON o.car_code = c1.car_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT car_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM operation GROUP BY car_code) latest_operation ON o.car_code = latest_operation.car_code AND o.created_at = latest_operation.max_created_at
SELECT mem_code, dept_code, position_name, name, email, role, hired_at, created_at, address, tel, is_worked, profile_img_url FROM mem
select c.car_name, c.car_code, d.accum_mileage, c.authority, c.fuel_type, d.fuel_effciency, d.car_address from car c join car_detail d on c.car_code=d.car_code where c.car_code=#{car_code}
